insee.title: French register of deceased persons
insee.description: Search among all the persons of French nationality who died after 1970.

arbreomatic.title: Arbre-o-matic
arbreomatic.privacy: No data is sent to the server: everything takes place in your web browser

special_characters.title: Some characters do not display correctly ?
special_characters.text: When exporting your data from the software of platform, please check that the Gedcom file encoding is set to UTF-8. This tool does not support extended ASCII.

arbreomatic.choose_sample_below: If you do not own a Gedcom file or simply want to test the service you may load an existing one from the list below:
arbreomatic.print_or_download: Print or download your family tree in the desired format
arbreomatic.click_to_load_ellipsis: Click to load a Gedcom file...
arbreomatic.or_drag_and_drop: or drag and drop a file
arbreomatic.use_mouse: Use the mouse to browse the preview
arbreomatic.substitute_missing_events_hint: Use the baptism when the birth is not specified

informations_to_hide_list.all_but: Everything besides the root individual name

arbreomatic.get_informed: Get informed of the new features:
arbreomatic.for_any_suggestion: If you have any question, suggestion or bug report:
arbreomatic.a_contact_form_is_available: a contact form is available here
arbreomatic.to_be_used_with: To be used with a modern web browser
arbreomatic.your_browser_is_incompatible: Sadly your browser is not compatible.

insee.title: French register of deceased persons
insee.search_in: Instantly query the database of French persons deceased after 1970:
insee.surname_required: You must specify at least one name
insee.search_produced_warnings: Your query produced the following warnings:
insee.exportation_only_available: Exportation is only available to queries producing less than 100 results

informations.introduction_body: In order to search for a record you must enter at least one surname. The other fields may help you refine the results but are not required.
informations.names_body: The order in which you specify the names does not matter. Only the records that match the names are returned (but these records can contain other names that you did not include).
informations.places_body: You may also select a location (town, department, region or country), in this case all the records that occurred at this location will be returned. The old town names are written in parenthesis, followed by the current town name.
informations.dates_body: Finally it is also possible to search with a specific date or a time interval (open or closed). The data will be be sorted according to the dates of the specified event kind.
informations.warnings_body_1: This database relies on the data provided by INSEE, it may contain missing or erroneous entries. Please do not report errors in the data.
informations.warnings_body_2: The accentuation of the given names is not necessarily correct.
informations.warnings_body_3: Some locations could not be collected and are thus not displayed.

insee.api_can_be_used: The service may also be used through the mean of its API, which is described here.
insee.endpoint_is: The root domain is the following:
insee.results_are_returned: The results are returned in json format.
insee.no_authentication_required: Authentication is not needed; access is free and does not require a token.
insee.soft_limitations: For the good operation of the services you are asked to avoid abusing the API: please try to stay below 3600 requests per hour and per ip address.
insee.user_agent: You are also encouraged to use an explicit User-Agent field (even if this is not mandatory).
insee.records_querying_description: Performs a query among the individual records.
insee.places_querying_description: Performs a query among the available places.
insee.geographical_stats_description: Gather geographical statistics for a search query.
insee.time_stats_description: Gather annual statistics for a search query.

warnings.special_characters: The queried names contain special characters; those were ignored
warnings.early_birth: The birth date is too early

insee.default_server_message: The server is not currently not able to serve your request.
